name: PROnewtech S.A.
overview: PROnewtech assist companies and institutions in managing the constant economic and technical changes in their industries. Our core competencies are in the areas of ICT project and process management. Totally independent, its vocation is to study and analyze for its clients the most cost effective solution between manufacturers, integrators and service providers. Created in 2009 within the European group of economic interests PROgroup GEIE, PROnewtech is an independent entity. The scope of the entity is to develop its portfolio of services, especially in the fields of Environment and Sustainable Development.
